text: Sofía Varela Espinoza (born 28 March 1998) is a Costa Rican footballer who plays as a forward for Deportivo Saprissa and the Costa Rica women's national team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football forwards Category:Costa Rican women's footballers Category:Costa Rica women's international footballers Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Costa Rica Category:Pan American Games medalists in football Category:Footballers at the 2019 Pan American Games
title: Sofía Varela
